member.name: P:Lottie.Forms.AnimationView.HardwareAcceleration
member.summary: Where possible/supported render the animation using hardware (GPU) rather than software (CPU) More information: https://airbnb.io/lottie/android/performance.html#hardware-acceleration No Effect on iOS

member.name: M:Lottie.Forms.UWP.Renderers.AnimationViewRenderer.Init
member.summary: Used for registration with dependency service
